About Me

Me, myself, and I...

BIO

I'm a family man, hard worker, and a full fledged nerd. Most of my college expierence was Java and relational databases, but I've recently found an interest with front-end development. I'm composing fullstack projects currently. My most valuable attribute is my passion for learning new things. I'm seeking entry-level employment in the computer science or IT fields with an employer that allows growth and advancement.
